description.value:
You have forgotten more about talismans than lesser warriors have ever known. Normally, affixing more than one talisman to an item causes the talismans to be suppressed, but when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Affix a Talisman], you can specially treat one item you're working on, allowing it to have two active talismans at once.

This special treatment ends if you use Affix a Talisman to treat a new item for this ability.
